markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lucky Rabbit's Foot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=568)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 175 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

**Access** follower of  Desna 

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Reaction" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You fail a Reflex save against a damaging effect.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This treated rabbit’s foot has shockingly blue fur and is often carried by vagabonds who worship Desna. When you activate the foot, reroll the triggering Reflex save. If you fail the second roll as well, you can Stride up to your Speed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Lucky Rabbit's Foot
